summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2338, for the improvement of Washington Street, from 30th Avenue South to 31st Avenue South, and 31st Avenue South, from Yesler Way to Washington Street; all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, by constructing concrete sidewalks, together with all necessary cross walks and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 24264 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
